author: cnbc.com
title: CIRCOR Announces Dates for First-Quarter 2018 Earnings Release and Conference Call
text:
BURLINGTON, Mass.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
CIRCOR International, Inc. (NYSE: CIR) today announced that it plans to release its first-quarter 2018 financial results after the close of the New York Stock Exchange on Tuesday, May 1, 2018.
At 9:00 a.m. ET Wednesday, May 2, 2018, the Company will conduct a conference call hosted by Scott Buckhout, President and Chief Executive Officer, and Rajeev Bhalla, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer.
To listen to the live conference call and view the accompanying presentation slides, please visit “Webcasts & Presentations” in the “Investors” portion of CIRCOR’s website. The live call also can be accessed by dialing (877) 407-5790 or (201) 689-8328. The webcast will be archived on the Company’s website for one year.
About CIRCOR International, Inc.
CIRCOR International, Inc. designs, manufactures and markets differentiated technology products and sub-systems for markets including oil & gas, industrial, aerospace & defense and commercial marine. CIRCOR has a diversified flow and motion control product portfolio with recognized, market-leading brands that fulfill its customers’ mission critical needs. The Company’s strategy is to grow organically and through complementary acquisitions; simplify CIRCOR’s operations; achieve world class operational excellence; and attract and retain top talent. For more information, visit the Company’s investor relations website at http://investors.circor.com .
